title: Magnetic field - wire bent into two semi-circles

content.question: A wire with current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math> is bent into two semi-circles of radius <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math> and radius <math alttext="2 s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi></math>, as shown. Which of the following expressions correctly describes the net magnetic field at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>P</mtext></math>, the center of both semi-circles?
